title: Bernier on the Mughal Empire Q2

content.question: The contractors described in the passage are an example of which of the following?

choices.label: Traditional elites attempting to subvert imperial authority
New elites recruited to generate increased revenue after imperial conquests
Representatives intended to make the central government more responsive to local issues
Professionalized military administrators who centralized land-based empires

content.answer: New elites recruited to generate increased revenue after imperial conquests

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
